== Video Overview ==

DVD support is not enabled in ubuntu by default. This is because of the format being a restricted one, and also because of legal issues. This screencast shows you how to install the dvd codec in ubuntu

== Target Audience ==

A user with a DVD Movie they'd like to watch

== Pre-requisites ==

A DVD

== Required Knowledge ==

None

== Recommended Knowledge ==

None

== Objectives ==

* Explain why DVD support is not in ubuntu by default
* Explain the legal issues
* Show how to install DVD support
* Test a DVD
